resources.string: This app is only activated when someone calls you from a number not in your address book. All you need to do is:
• Do not respond or reject the call: let it ring and shake the phone (ringtone volume will be lowered instantly)
• Evaluate the search results: the number may have been reported as telemarketer, scammer or other boring people.
• Go back to answer or reject the call.
Activate the search function only when connected to WiFi.
Always reject calls from people who hide their phone number (private numbers).
Touch to open the calls log
Incoming call ended as requested (private number)
Search funtion disabled by user request (WIFI only)
